pullRequest.title: CB-9382 make sure getResourceCrnByResourceName not returns null
pullRequest.bodyText: make sure getResourceCrnByResourceName for BlueprintService is not returning null and framework also responds with 404 if resourceCrn cannot be found

nodes.bodyText: maybe it is better to throw here a not found also, isn't it?
